Description: Blue glazed composition integral finger-ring: the bezel section is elaborated with an open-work representation of a 'wedjat'-eye.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: H. Frankfort and J. D. S Pendlebury, ‘The City of Akhenaten. The North Suburb and Desert Altars. The Excavations at Tell el Armana During the Seasons 1926-1932 (London 1951); T. Eric Peet & C. Leonard Woolley ‘et al.’, ‘The City of Akhenaten. Excavations of 1921 and 1922 at el-‘Amarneh’, Pt. I, (London 1923), pl. xiii, 2.
